name: "Chopper"
description: You may perform actions while stressed. After you perform an action while stressed, suffer 1 damage.

name: "Zeb" Orrelios
description: Enemy ships inside your firing arc that you are touching are not considered to be touching you when either you or they activate during the Combat phase.

name: Bombardier
description: When dropping a bomb, you may use the [{forward}2] template instead of the [{forward}1] template.

name: Hera Syndulla
description: You can reveal and execute red manoeuvres even while stressed.

name: Intelligence Agent
description: At the start of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2. You may look at that ship's chosen manoeuvre.

name: Nien Nunb
description: You may treat all {forward} manoeuvres as green manoeuvres.

name: Shield Technician
description: When you perform a recover action, instead of spending all your energy, you can choose any amount of energy to spend.

name: "Leebo"
description: Action: Perform a free boost action. Then receive 1 ion token.

name: Dash Rendar
description: You may perform attacks while overlapping an obstacle. Your attacks cannot be obstructed.

name: Han Solo
description: When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend that target lock to change all your {eye} results to {hit} results.

name: Jan Ors
description: Once per round, when a friendly ship at range 1-3 performs a focus action or would be assigned a focus token, you may assign an evade token instead.

name: Mercenary Copilot
description: When attacking at Range 3, you may change one of your {hit} results to a {critical} result.

name: Sabine Wren
description: Your upgrade bar gains the {bomb} upgrade icon. Once per round, before a friendly bomb token is removed, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1 of that token. That ship suffers 1 damage.

name: Saboteur
description: Action: Choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1 and roll 1 attack die. On a {hit} or {critical} result, choose 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to that ship, flip it faceup, and resolve it.

name: Tactician
description: After you perform an attack against a ship inside your firing arc at Range 2, that ship receives 1 stress token. Limited.

name: WED-15 Repair Droid
description: Action: Spend 1 energy to discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards, or spend 3 energy to discard 1 of your faceup Damage cards.

name: C-3PO
description: Once per round, before you roll 1 or more defense dice, you may guess aloud a number of {evade} results. If you roll that many {evade} results (before modifying the dice), add 1 {evade} result.

name: Carlist Rieekan
description: At the start of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to treat each friendly ship's pilot skill value as "12" until the end of the phase.

name: Construction Droid
description: When you perform a recover action, you may spend 1 energy to discard 1 facedown Damage card. Limited.

name: Ezra Bridger
description: When attacking, if you are stressed, you may change 1 of your {eye} results to a {critical} result.

name: Kanan Jarrus
description: Once per round, after a friendly ship at Range 1-2 executes a white manoeuvre, you may remove 1 stress token from that ship.

name: Kyle Katarn
description: After you remove a stress token from your ship, you may assign a focus token to your ship.

name: Lando Calrissian
description: Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each {eye} result, assign 1 focus token to your ship. For each {evade} result , assign 1 evade token to your ship.

name: Navigator
description: When you reveal a manoeuvre, you may rotate your dial to another manoeuvre with the same bearing. You cannot rotate to a red manoeuvre if you have any stress tokens.

name: Recon Specialist
description: When you perform a focus action, assign 1 additional focus token to your ship.

name: Weapons Engineer
description: You may maintain 2 target locks (only 1 per enemy ship). When you acquire a target lock, you may lock onto 2 enemy ships.

name: Chewbacca
description: When you are dealt a Damage card, you may immediately discard that card and recover 1 shield. Then, discard this Upgrade card.

name: Flight Instructor
description: When defending, you may reroll one of your {eye} results. If the attacker's pilot skill value is "2" or lower, you may reroll 1 of your blank results instead.

name: Leia Organa
description: At the start of the Activation Phase, you may discard this card to allow all friendly ships that reveal a red manoeuvre to treat that manoeuvre as a white manoeuvre until the end of the turn.

name: R2-D2
description: At the end of the End phase, if you have no shields, you may recover 1 shield and roll 1 attack die. On a {hit} result, randomly flip one of your facedown Damage cards faceup and resolve it.

name: Targeting Coordinator
description: Energy: You may spend 1 energy to choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2. Acquire a target lock, then assign the blue target lock token to the chosen ship.

name: Gunner
description: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack. You cannot perform another attack this round.

name: Jan Dodonna
description: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking, it may change 1 of its {hit} results to a {critical}.

name: Raymus Antilles
description: At the start of the Activation Phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-3. You may look at that ship's chosen manoeuvre. If that manoeuvre is white, assign that ship 1 stress token.

name: Toryn Farr
description: Action: Spend any amount of energy to choose that many enemy ships at Range 1-2. Remove all focus, evade, and blue target lock tokens from those ships.

name: Luke Skywalker
description: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack. You may change 1 {eye} result to a {hit} result. You cannot perform another attack this round.
